content: Brown Christians outnumber White Christians 5 to 1. Liberal Homogeneous agenda chooses to identify religion as racist and bigoted (and White), unless it’s Muslims (then suddenly Arabs are not White). Consistently denying the existence of the Majority of Christians as POC is racist. It is mindful deceptive rhetoric allowing fallacious and manipulative arguments masquerading as ‘anti-bigot’. I am beginning to suspect that claiming to be morally superior is not the same as being moral.
